subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Court 17, the new stadium at Flushing Meadows, accommodates only 2,500 fans — and has thrilled spectators and players alike with the energy its close-in seating creates.
snippet: Court 17, the new stadium at Flushing Meadows, accommodates only 2,500 fans — and has thrilled spectators and players alike with the energy its close-in seating creates.
